title: Enable SSL/TLS certificate verification in Obsidian service
description: HIGH SECURITY: src/services/obsidian.py:64 has verify=False which disables certificate validation, enabling MITM attacks. Need to enable SSL verification and handle self-signed certificates properly.

title: Set up Python development environment
description: Python environment is not properly configured - venv module missing, pip not available. Need to install python3-venv and set up virtual environment for dependency installation and testing.

title: Remove all hardcoded credentials from source code
description: CRITICAL security vulnerability: hardcoded database passwords and API keys in multiple files. Files affected: docker-compose.yml, config/database.env, src/api/routes/agent.py. Need to implement environment variable management and update .gitignore. Risk: Full database compromise if repository access is gained.

title: Add type hints to __init__ methods
description: CODE QUALITY: ~15 __init__ methods missing return type annotations (-> None). Violates MyPy strict mode configuration. Need to add type hints to maintain code quality and pass type checking.

title: Implement JWT authentication on all API endpoints
description: CRITICAL: All API endpoints currently unauthenticated, allowing unrestricted access to all data. Need to implement JWT token system, user model, login endpoint, and protect all routes. This is required before any deployment as any data can be accessed/modified without credentials.

title: Fix path traversal vulnerabilities in Obsidian routes
description: HIGH SECURITY: src/api/routes/obsidian.py has 3 endpoints vulnerable to path traversal attacks using '../' patterns. Allows reading arbitrary files including database.env credentials. Need to implement path validation utility and apply to all file operations.

title: Critical: Install pip and virtual environment tools
description: System lacks pip and python3-venv package. Requires system admin to install: apt install python3-venv python3-pip. Without this, cannot set up development environment for BrainForge.
close_reason: Successfully installed python3-pip and python3-venv packages. Both pip and virtual environment tools are now functional and ready for development environment setup.

title: Comprehensive security vulnerability remediation
description: Project has 28+ critical security vulnerabilities: hardcoded passwords, missing JWT auth, path traversal, weak hashing, no rate limiting. Immediate remediation required before any feature development.

title: Fix import path errors in 4 critical files
description: CRITICAL: Import path errors prevent application from starting. Files: src/services/pdf_processor.py, src/services/ingestion_service.py, src/api/routes/ingestion.py, src/services/base.py. Missing 'src.' prefix in imports causing runtime ImportError. Must fix before any testing can proceed.

title: Sanitize error responses to prevent information disclosure
description: MEDIUM SECURITY: Multiple route files expose full exception details and stack traces to clients. This helps attackers understand system internals. Need centralized error handler and remove sensitive information from user-facing responses.

title: Replace MD5 hashing with SHA-256
description: HIGH SECURITY: Two locations using cryptographically broken MD5 hashing. Files: src/services/sync.py:75, src/services/embedding_generator.py:206. Need to replace with SHA-256 and handle existing data migration. Collision attacks possible with current implementation.

title: Fix temporary file cleanup in ingestion service
description: MEDIUM SECURITY: src/api/routes/ingestion.py uploads temp files without guaranteed cleanup on failure. Could cause disk space exhaustion and temp file exposure. Need ensure cleanup on both success and failure paths.

title: Add data encryption at rest for sensitive fields
description: SECURITY: All data stored unencrypted. Need field-level encryption for sensitive data (personal content, audit logs) to meet compliance requirements and protect data if database is compromised.

title: Fix N+1 query problems in semantic search
description: CODE QUALITY: src/services/semantic_search.py has N+1 query performance issue where each search result triggers separate database query. With 100 results = 101 queries. Need batch query implementation for scalable performance.

title: Add comprehensive test coverage
description: CODE QUALITY: Current test ratio is 1:3 (should be 1:1 minimum). Many services lack dedicated tests (embedding_generator.py, database.py). Need unit tests plus error path testing and integration tests.

title: Implement structured logging and monitoring
description: INFRASTRUCTURE: No centralized logging configuration, structured JSON logging, correlation IDs, or performance metrics. Need proper observability for production deployment and debugging.

title: Implement GDPR compliance mechanisms
description: COMPLIANCE: Missing data deletion, export, consent tracking endpoints. Need GDPR data deletion rights, data export functionality, and privacy policy integration for regulatory compliance.

title: Implement rate limiting for all API endpoints
description: HIGH SECURITY: No rate limiting implemented anywhere. Vulnerable to DoS attacks, brute force authentication, resource exhaustion. Need to install slowapi and apply appropriate limits per endpoint type (auth: 5/min, uploads: 5/min, search: 30/min, general: 100/min).
